title: UC Walks Away from Elsevier
dc:creator: Queens Podcast Lab
description: The University of California recently walked away from negotiations with academic publisher Elsevier. This move could represent a major dramatic change in the relationship between universities and publishers. We discuss publishing costs, and the role of publishers in higher education.
itunes:subtitle: The University of California recently walked away from negotiations with academic publisher Elsevier.  This move could represent a major dramatic change in the relationship between universities and publishers.  We discuss publishing costs, and the role of publishers in higher education.
